entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except north 60 km/h gusting to 80 over southern sections. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except north 70 km/h gusting to 90 over southern sections. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except north 70 km/h gusting to 90 over southern sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
